objects.description: [Crimson](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0115) contains a command to collect the victim PC name, disk drive information, and operating system.(Citation: Proofpoint Operation Transparent Tribe March 2016)(Citation: Kaspersky Transparent Tribe August 2020)(Citation: Cisco Talos Transparent Tribe Education Campaign July 2022)
